name: Employee Satisfaction Survey
description: Annual employee satisfaction and engagement survey

welcomeScreen.title: Your Voice Matters
welcomeScreen.message: This anonymous survey helps us create a better workplace. Your honest feedback is valued and will be used to improve our company culture.

questions.description: How satisfied are you with your job overall?
How would you rate your work-life balance?
Do you feel you have opportunities for career growth?
How supportive is your direct manager?
Do you feel aligned with the company's values?
What's one thing we could improve to make this a better place to work?
What do you appreciate most about working here?

endScreen.title: Thank You for Your Feedback
endScreen.message: Your responses have been submitted anonymously. We'll share the results and action plans with the team next month.
